name: Release 1.4.4
body: - Mozilla restored the old API Response (the app now supports both systems)

name: Release 1.4.3
body:
- Listen section now works again: Mozilla changed API Response so the previously versions don't work!
- Updated Arabian translation

name: Release 1.4.2
body:
- Fixed many bugs
- Added "Buy me a coffee" in F-Droid and GitHub version
- Added message "Review the app on Google Play Store" for Play Store version
- Added message "The app is not (completed) translated …"
- Added check when you run the app if the session id of the user is expired
- Fix a bug with gestures
- Added Arabic and Catalan
- Translation in Tamil (ta) completed.
- Updated all translations

name: Release 1.4.1
body: - Fixed a bug in Dashboard (for Statistics)

name: Release 1.4
body:
- Updated languages
- Implemented gestures #74
- Implemented "skip recording confirmation" #75
- Fixed bug in daily goal (for android 7).
- Added seekbar in First-run speak & listen
- Updated screenshots
- Added Persian (and Estonian)
- Updated screenshots

name: Release 1.3.1
body:
- Fixed a bug in Dashboard -> You must do the log in to set daily goal
- When you log out, it reset also daily goal
- Improved "check for updates"
- Updated languages
- Improved performance

name: Release 1.2.3
body:
- Some improvements
- Updated Anonymous Statistics (v2 API) -> now it's sent as POST request (anonymous statistics now are caught also if they are disabled -> if they are turned off app sent "public=false" otherwise "public=true").

name: Release 1.2.2
body: - Updated languages (French and Interlingua now are completely translated),

name: Release 1.2.1
body:
- Updated translations
- Fixed some bugs (check updates, button "listen" not correctly anchored, ect.)
- Optimised some code

name: Release 1.2
body:
- Added "Recording indicator sound", if turned on it reproduce a sound when you start/stop to record a sentence (in Speak)
- Added "Check for updates" option in Settings
- Added "Experimental featues" in Settings
- Added shortcut in Settings: "Translate the app on Crowdin" and "See app statistics"
- Removed "Donate to the developer" because it's agains google play store policy
- Added "Abort confirmation dialogs in Settings" in Settings
- Added "Report" button
- Added "Record again" icon in Speak after stop the recording
- Fixed some bugs in the UI (ladscape in Listen and Speak redisegned)
- Hide "Experimental features" for now

name: Release 1.1.1 (stable)
body:
- App promoted to "Stable" channel
- Removed Aptoide
- Message dialogs (and daily goal dialog) now follow app theme (dark/light)
- Improvements to the UI
- Fixed bugs

name: Release 1.1b
body:
- Implemented "Daily goal"
- Added message dialog when a new version is available
- Added Turkish translation
- Updated English strings
- Updated all languages
- Fixed some bugs

name: Release 1.0b
body:
- Implemented Speak section (thanks @MrIndeciso and @mone27)
- Added Dutch translateion (partial)
- Updated translations
- Added Anonymous statistics
- Fixed many bugs #50 #55 #48

name: Release 0.2.11b
body:
- Added Spanish and Czech translations
- Added "Back" button in the Login
- Fixed some bugs
- Updated all translations
- Improved the UI

name: Release 0.2.10b
body: - Fixed some bugs (#40 #36)

name: Release 0.2.9b
body: - Fixed "Log in with Google" bug #39

name: Release 0.2.8b
body:
- Fixed some bugs
- French and Swedish translations completed

name: Release 0.2.7b
body:
- Translated the app in German (thanks acrylicpaintboy)
- Improvements to the UI
- Fixed some bugs

name: Release 0.2.6b
body: - Fixed a bug in Android 6.0

name: Release 0.2.5b
body: - Added translation in Russian (thanks @komachi)

name: Release 0.2.4b
body: - Some improvements to the UI

name: Release 0.2.3b
body:
- Fixed bug in Login/Signup (#29)
- Added partial translation in Estonian

name: Release 0.2.2b
body:
- Improvements to the dark theme
- Added button in Settings to contact the developer on Telegram
- Added 4 new supported languages (Assamese, Punjabi, Polish and Rumantsch Vallader)

name: Release 0.2.1b
body: - Improved and fix bugs in dashboard

name: Release 0.2b
body:
- Improvemed app experience: section Listen now is faster (load 2 clips the first time, so while you validate a clip, in background it downloads another)
- Added dark theme

name: Release 0.1.1b
body: - Updated "Basque" language

name: Release 0.1b
body:
- Fixed some bugs
- Added swith on-off in Settings for auto-play clips after loaded (default: off)
- Updated README.md
- Added Today contributions for You (it shows just contributions done in the app)
- Improved UI
- Reorganised Settings
- Removed zillaslab, replaced with default font of the device
- Implemented Levels in Profile #23
- Optimised code

name: Release 0.0.20b
body:
- Added Badges for logged-in users in Profile
- Added profile image in Profile
- Improved localisation
- Updated translations
- Fixed minor bugs
- Micrphone and Storage permissions now are asked just in Speak section

name: Release 0.0.19b
body:
- Added Badges for logged-in users in Profile
- Added profile image in Profile
- Improved localisation
- Updated translations
- Fixed minor bugs
- Micrphone and Storage permissions now are asked just in Speak section

name: Release 0.0.18b
body:
- WebBrowser ForTests added
- Fixed login by email, now you can open the verification link in-app
- Added all languages available on website (CV)
- Added partial Basque translations
